summary: This is an email chain from December 11, 2019, forwarding contact details for a UK solicitor, with an amended letter attached. It involves a Detective Sergeant from the Metropolitan Police's Counter Terrorism Command providing updated information to a recipient, likely related to legal or investigative coordination between the UK and US.

persons.name: Robert Walls
persons.role: Detective Sergeant, Staff Officer to Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations)
persons.context: He is the sender of the forwarded email, apologizing for a mix-up and providing corrected solicitor contact details with an amended letter attached.

persons.name: Lucy D'Orsi
persons.context: She is the superior officer to whom Detective Sergeant Robert Walls is a staff officer, mentioned in his email signature.

connections.description: Robert Walls serves as the Staff Officer to Deputy Assistant Commissioner Lucy D'Orsi within the Metropolitan Police's Specialist Operations.

events.title: Email Forwarding UK/US Contact Details
events.description: An email chain is forwarded containing corrected solicitor contact details and an amended letter, likely for legal or investigative coordination between the UK and US.

locations: 4th Floor, New Scotland Yard, Richmond Terrace, Victoria Embankment, London SW1A 2JL
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated December 11, 2019, involving UK law enforcement.
Detective Sergeant Robert Walls provides corrected solicitor contact details and an amended letter, indicating ongoing legal or investigative coordination.
The correspondence originates from the Metropolitan Police's Counter Terrorism Command (Specialist Operations).
The email includes multiple attachments, one being an 'AMENDED letter to_United_States_Attomey.pdf', suggesting formal communication with US authorities.
The context implies prior communication and a need to correct information regarding UK/US contact details.
